name: Quadio
headline: Mobile development at a startup building a streaming platform and social network for college musicians.
paragraphs: Most recently, I worked as a mobile engineer at Quadio, a startup building a new hybrid streaming platform and social media app for college students. I worked with a team of two other engineers on the companyâ€™s iOS app, which was built primarily in React Native, but also included a Swift and Objective-C powered music player.

head.title: Quadio - Camden Phalen
head.description: Mobile development at a startup building a streaming platform and social network for college musicians.
